title: Are ‘Bicarb Systems’ all Hype or Here to Stay? Study Points to Big Progress for Baking Soda Performance-Boosters
content:
Most of the WorldTour is slurping Maurten's solution to sodium bicarbonate, and new studies prove its potential – but bicarb supplementation might remain a micro-gain.

Read the full article at Are ‘Bicarb Systems’ all Hype or Here to Stay? Study Points to Big Progress for Baking Soda Performance-Boosters on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
